Lunarpine tried not to laugh when he noticed that the defenses were pointin=
g at the relays instead of at him. He didn't know where the others were he =
just had faith that Foxfingers was to smart to be in the way of any weapons=
 fire. Once again he opened the comm. "We are a peaceful group, we only wan=
t Silver Scout returned to us undamaged and unchanged." he had to stall for=
 Foxfingers and Razor Claw to get into position. "If you send her out we wi=
ll leave and forget we were ever here.

Meanwhile Foxfingers took the hint =
from Lunarpine and activated the mirror sensors. There were now dozens of e=
nergy signatures scattered in Predacon territory.

"I think it's time to mo=
ve." Razor Claw inturupted pointing out the rising lava. transfoming to Wol=
verine mode the mutant sprinted up the side of the Black fortress as if on =
flat land. Foxfingers shot a laser line up the side and used it to pull him=
self to higher ground. He scanned a large room on the other side of the wal=
l and used a cutting torch and forcefield generator to gain entry. The cutt=
ing torch gave them entry and the forcefield generator prevented any loss o=
f compression or any defenses or alarms from detecting the hole. Once insid=
e Foxfingers knew that they had to move quickly so they'd be anywhere else =
when the lava destroyed the generator.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  Fr=
om: Airshadow Nightlight 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, Aug=
ust 10, 2001 1:21 PM
  Subject: A mutant, a wolf... /Shivah/Message to Pred=
acons in BF


  Shivah:: 

  "I'm Shivah" said the male answred "We detecte=
d your position in our territory" when he had said that words externals def=
ences appeared and  they were ready to open fire "I've showed you our defen=
ce in order to show you that we aren't kidding... but we let you speak and =
heard your ideas, but I advice you, that we aren't in humor to stand any tr=
ick... if you try something you will regret it... Now let me heard your pro=
pose... and please if you're interesting to get an agreement tell your two =
friends be out Volcano's area... the lava level are increasing and they cou=
ld be destroyed..." 

  The lava level was ingcreasing and soon BlackFortre=
ss would be  under the surface of lava
